casebody.data:
No. 10-179. Howard K. Stern, Executor of the Estate of Vickie Lynn Marshall, Petitioner v. Elaine T. Marshall, Executrix of the Estate of E. Pierce Marshall. 562 U.S. 1127, 131 S. Ct. 858,

178 L. Ed. 2d 622,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8. January 7, 2011.

Motion of the Acting Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
